EmailTemplate.name: Data_Submission_NotSubmitting
EmailTemplate.subject: GADM submission not received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Submission file(s) from *actor* have not been received for *monthsNotSubmitting* months. Continued failure to submit data may result in restricted access to the GADM program.
Please provide the data at your earliest convenience or contact GADM Admin (*email*) for assistance.
GADM Team gadm@iata.org
